title: Web 3 Graphic Design Asssets
description: Cultivating desire is very profitable for the companies that build these platforms and algorithms, so they refuse to investigate legitimate concerns from users or intervene when algorithms corrupt curated feeds and make platforms unusable for children and users who do not want to be inundated with sexualised content.
